title: ILocalCircularPatternFeatureData.GetModifiedInstance
description: Gets the modified values for the specified pattern instance in this circular component pattern feature.
signature:
void GetModifiedInstance( 
   System.Int32
Instance
,
   out System.Double
AngleFromSeed
,
   out System.Double
OffsetFromNominal
)

parameters.name: OffsetFromNominal
parameters.description: Degree offset from the nominal position of Instance

remarks:
To specify Instance, you can use
ILocalCircularPatternFeatureData::GetModifiedInstances
to learn which pattern instances are modified.
To calculate Instance:
Calculate:
For a bi-directional pattern:
I
=
n2
* (
i
- 1) + (
j
- 1)
For a uni-directional pattern:
I
=
i
- 1
where:
I
= pattern instance number
n2
= number of instances in Direction 2
i
= index for Direction 1
j
= index for Direction 2
In the pattern's PropertyManager, find
n2
in the
Direction 2
> Spacing and Instances > Number of instances
field and find [
i,j
] in the
Modified Instances
section.
